content.query:
CREATE VIEW CreditCard AS
select 
    CreditCardID = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CreditCardID'),
    CardType = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CardType'),
    CardNumber = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.CardNumber'),
    ExpMonth = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ExpMonth'),
    ExpYear = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ExpYear'),    
    ModifiedDate = JSON_VALUE(Body, '$.ModifiedDate')
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://2by1datalake.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/Raw/CreditCard/Year=*/Month=*/Day=*/File=*/*.snappy.parquet',
    format = 'parquet')
 AS [r];
